activities: WebFurther is a privately held company that offers Web Services and APIs. When a user registers for any WebFurther product, we ask for information such as name, company name, email address, billing address, credit card information. Members who sign up for our free trials are not required to enter a credit card. WebFurther uses collected information for the following general purposes: products and services provision, billing, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research. WebFurther does not share personal information with third parties, unless explicitly approved by the user.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: all client and customer personal data, manually processed and electronic
